EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
NCS with The Challenge Information Evening CORRECTION
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.Name} and {!Contact.FirstName},
Please ignore the information evening invitation email dated 30 September.
We are writing to let you know that there was an error in the information evening details sent to you on 30 September. We are really sorry for any confusion caused by this.
The correct details for {!Contact.FirstName}’s information evening are as follows:
Date: 16/10/2014 Time: 6:30pm Address: Kenilworth School. Leyes Lane. Kenilworth. Warwickshire. CV8 2DA.
The evening will last approximately 1 hour, with a short presentation starting within the first 15 minutes. Please arrive promptly so we can start on time.
At this short information evening, you will have the opportunity to meet other participants and parents/guardians, and to ask us any questions you may have.
Please confirm your attendance by emailing leke.sholuade@the-challenge.org or by calling 07837 764405.
If you are unable to attend but would still like to meet us, we will be holding other evenings for programmes running in different areas. Please contact us on the details above to discuss these.
This event is for parents/guardians and participants, but if you want to bring a friend who may be interested in NCS with The Challenge, please just let us know when confirming your attendance. We would be happy to meet them and discuss the likelihood of them getting a place.
We hope to see you at the information evening.
Yours sincerely,
Leke Sholuade The Challenge
